question:
Write a letter to a friend telling her about an interesting website that you have found recently
in your letter say how you find it, how it can help, how you use it.
text: I would like to let you know that while I am browsing for my office related information, I found a new website called www.atoz.com which is very interesting with real-time topis on the most recent issues.

This URL is all about new developments and innovations which are happening in the country and I am sure that this is much needed to complete your mid-year project work as I could see those same requirements in your studies. In addition, you can refer to experts' suggestions and review comments on this website and these  would help you make the right decision on time without further delay.

There are some interesting options given  on this URL, wherein if somebody does not have any idea on how to start  browsing and where to look for data and then this would be the final stop for them . you just get into it once and the rest URL admin will take care of everything  free of cost.
I hope you will get the required information by using this URL and I wish you all the best in your project work.
